sentences.sContent: I saw a caterpillar on the leaf.
sentences.sContent_eng: I saw a caterpillar on the leaf.
sentences.sCn: 我看见一条毛毛虫在叶子上。

sentences.sContent: The caterpillar might well give you nightmares though!
sentences.sContent_eng: The caterpillar might well give you nightmares though!
sentences.sCn: 但是，它的毛虫却可能引起你噩梦！

sentences.sContent: The caterpillars grow. This caterpillar is big and fat.
sentences.sContent_eng: The caterpillars grow. This caterpillar is big and fat.
sentences.sCn: 这毛虫渐渐成长。这个毛虫是大的和肥的。

remMethod.val: 该词本意是hairy cat(长毛的猫)， 其中pillar意为hair

trans.tranOther: a small creature like a  worm  with many legs that eats leaves and that develops into a  butterfly  or other flying insect
